txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Worn sword sheaths from the weaker brigands camped throughout Bree-land. Deliver the items to Second-watcher Heathstraw at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
'These look right, nothing that strange about them, just leather and metal, but sinister in use. Thank you.'
'We noticed when they have attacked and been stopped, that nearly all the weaker brigands carry these sword sheaths. Collect those and earn favour with Bree.'
Men of Bree Task: Worn Sword Sheaths
Second-watcher Heathstraw is offering compensation for the collection of worn sword sheaths from lesser brigands throughout Bree-land.
Deliver the worn sword sheaths to Second-watcher Heathstraw
You have been tasked with finding worn sword sheaths from the weaker brigands camped around Bree-land. Second-watcher Heathstraw awaits the delivery of these items at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
Wanted: Worn sword sheaths from the weaker brigands camped throughout Bree-land.
